member.name: T:TypeMock.Integration.IntegrationLicenseException
member.summary: IntegrationLicenseException is thrown when trying to use Typemock Isolator feature without a proper license installed on the machine
member.example: The machine has a community license and and the application is trying to link with coverage tool.

member.summary: The license key in invalid

member.name: F:TypeMock.Integration.LicenseScope.AllUsers
member.summary: The license key is for all users - requires correct privaleges

member.name: T:TypeMock.Integration.Packs
member.summary: The Packs class is used to allow extending Isolator with additional functionality.
member.remarks:
This class in the entry point for integrating Typemock Isolator with other applications. For example, it allows registering and unregistering new packages, set, check and remove licenses.
As this assembly is used for integration, it is version agnostic and is both backward and forward compatible. This assembly does not require other Typemock Isolator assemblies and can be deployed separately

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.Packs.SetLicense(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set a license key for a specific package
member.param: Package name
License key
The company that received the license key
Set license for all users or current user
member.exception:
Will be thrown in the following conditions:
One of the string arguments is either null or an empty string
The license key argument is not valid

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.Packs.Register(System.String,TypeMock.Integration.LicenseScope)
member.summary: Register a package. If you would like to build your own package for Typemock Isolator, contact us at www.typemock.com.
member.param: Package name
Scope of the package license
member.exception: Will be thrown if the productName argument is either null or an empty string.

para.example:
Example of using Packs.Register:
Packs.Register("MyPackName");

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.Packs.CheckLicense(System.String)
member.summary: Checks the validity of the license and returns the license status as LicenseStatus enum
member.param: Package name

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.Packs.Unregister(System.String,TypeMock.Integration.LicenseScope)
member.summary: Unregister a package. If you would like to build your own package for Typemock Isolator, contact us at www.typemock.com.
member.param: Package name
Scope of the package license
member.exception: Will be thrown if the productName argument is either null or an empty string.

para.example:
Example of using Packs.Unregister:
Packs.Unregister("MyPackName");

member.name: T:TypeMock.Integration.Service
member.summary: The main class used to integrate Typemock Isolator with other applications.

member.name: P:TypeMock.Integration.Service.InstallDirectory
member.summary: Retrieve the Typemock Isolator installation directory
member.returns: Full path of Typemock Isolator installation directory. Returns null if TypeMock is not installed

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.Service.InstallFrom(System.String)
member.summary: Install (AutoDeploy) Typemock Isolator from a specific directory. (This requires an Enterprise License)
member.param: Path to Typemock Isolator deployed directory

member.name: P:TypeMock.Integration.Service.IsInstalled
member.summary: Check if Typemock Isolator is installed on the machine
member.returns: True if Typemock Isolator is installed otherwise returns false

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.Service.HasLicenseToLink
member.summary: Check if the running machine has license for linking TypeMock with coverage tool
member.returns: True if the machine has Enterprise license otherwise returns false

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.Service.HasLicenseForAutodeploy
member.summary: Check if the running machine has license for Auto Deploying TypeMock
member.returns: True if the machine has Enterprise license otherwise returns false

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.Service.GetCoverageTools(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get list of profilers available to link with Typemock Isolator
member.param: set to true to get list of only available profilers on the machine set to false to get all the profilers supported by Typemock Isolator

member.name: T:TypeMock.Integration.TypeMockProcess
member.summary: This class manages Processes running with Typemock Isolator.

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.TypeMockProcess.#ctor
member.summary: Deriving class should override this constructor when it needs to create process instance with Typemock Isolator enabled

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.TypeMockProcess.#ctor(System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo)
member.summary: Create a new process with Typemock Isolator enabled
member.param: the ProcessStartInfo of the process

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.TypeMockProcess.#ctor(System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a new process with Typemock Isolator enabled
member.param: the ProcessStartInfo of the process
Set to false when you want to start unblocking process. The default mode is blocking

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.TypeMockProcess.#ctor(System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Create a new process with Typemock Isolator enabled and a code coverage tool linked
member.param: the ProcessStartInfo of the process
the name of the coverage profiler to link with Typemock Isolator

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.TypeMockProcess.Start
member.summary: Starts new process with Typemock Isolator enabled

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.TypeMockProcess.Start(System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo)
member.summary: Starts new process with Typemock Isolator enabled
member.param: ProcessStartInfo with information to start the process

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.TypeMockProcess.Start(System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Starts new process with Typemock Isolator enabled and a coverage profiler linked
member.param: ProcessStartInfo with information to start the process
Coverage profiler name to link with TypeMock

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.TypeMockProcess.Start(System.String)
member.summary: Starts new process with Typemock Isolator enabled.
member.param: The name of a document or application file to run in the process.

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.TypeMockProcess.Start(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Starts new process with Typemock Isolator enabled.
member.param: The name of an application file to run in the process.
Command-line arguments to pass when starting the process.

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.TypeMockProcess.DisableTypeMockOnProcess
member.summary: Disable Typemock Isolator on process

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.TypeMockProcess.DisableTypeMockOnProcess(System.Diagnostics.Process)
member.summary: Disable Typemock Isolator on process
member.param: Process object to disable Typemock Isolator

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.TypeMockProcess.PrepareTypeMockProcess
member.summary: Enable Typemock Isolator on process

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.TypeMockProcess.PrepareTypeMockProcess(System.Diagnostics.Process)
member.summary: Enables Typemock Isolator on process
member.param: Process to enable Typemock Isolator on

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.TypeMockProcess.UnlinkWithCovarage
member.summary: Unlinks coverage profiler

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.TypeMockProcess.IsEnabled
member.summary: Use to determain if Typemock Isolator is enabled on process
member.returns: true if Typemock Isolator is enabled on process otherwise returns false

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.TypeMockProcess.IsEnabled(System.Diagnostics.Process)
member.summary: Use to determain if Typemock Isolator is enabled on process
member.param: The process we want to check
member.returns: true if Typemock Isolator is enabled on the process otherwise returns false

member.name: M:TypeMock.Integration.TypeMockProcess.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Note: Dispose is already implemented by Process base class
member.param: true when called from user code. false when called by runtime from Finalize method
